name: Dawn's Mask
description:
Dawn's Mask

Travel throughout a series of mazes, unsure of where to go. Only the light around you can uncover your path.

The Dual purpose mechanic in this game is the Light. The Light serves as the mechanic to uncover the map, however the player character cannot walk in to this light.

Windows

Unity 2017.1
Soundtrack: Chopin Nocturne Op72No1, Nocturne Op48No1, Prelude Op28No4 (public domain, sourced from archive.org) Edits performed in Audacity (GPL)
Font: http://www.dafont.com/dominican.font Credit: http://haroldsfonts.com/
Sound effects from Freesound.org and Pond5.com
2DDL Light effects: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/25933

Contributors:
